author: siren
msg: cleaned up package to use generics and java5 loops, removed unnecessary log guards, fixed indentation

author: djencks
msg: OPENEJB-276 add LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt files to jars

author: craigmcc
msg: Factor Commons Validator support out of shale-core into a new module
"shale-validator".  We do not yet have any example or test applications
using this code, so we cannot yet verify correct operation.  In addition,
the current implementation uses JSP tags with behavior in some cases,
which will cause integration difficulties with non-JSP view handler
implementations such as Clay and Facelets.

author: norman
msg: Catch UnknownHostException when try to resolve ip on init Handler. See JAMES-646
